gold.user: User wants to retrieve a list of all SIP Credential Lists associated with their Twilio account to manage access for SIP endpoints.
gold.ideal: A JSON response containing an array of SIP Credential Lists with details such as SID, friendly name, and date created.

gold.user: User needs to create a new SIP Credential List to manage a group of SIP credentials for their application.
gold.ideal: A JSON response confirming the creation of the SIP Credential List, including its SID and other relevant details.

gold.user: User wants to fetch details of a specific SIP Credential List to review its configuration and credentials.
gold.ideal: A JSON response containing the details of the specified SIP Credential List, including its SID, friendly name, and associated credentials.

gold.user: User needs to update an existing SIP Credential List to add or modify credentials for better access control.
gold.ideal: A JSON response confirming the update of the SIP Credential List, including the updated details and SID.

gold.user: User wants to delete a specific SIP Credential List that is no longer needed to clean up their account.
gold.ideal: A JSON response confirming the deletion of the SIP Credential List, indicating that it has been successfully removed.
